About

Hello, I am Duygu. I am a Computer Engineer. I studied Computer Engineering at Gazi University from 2010 to 2014. I have been working at Mantis Software since 2014. I have worked on a topic specific influence analysis on twitter users which can be seen here. In the last two years I mostly used Java, Hadoop, MongoDB and Nutch in the projects I have worked on.

I am interested in Data Mining, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.
